362.question: What was their result on Stance Sentiment Emotion Corpus?

5-TableII-1.png: The result on Stance Sentiment Emotion Corpus was 65.44.</s>
The result on Stance Sentiment Emotion Corpus was 65.44.</s>

363.question: What performance did they obtain on the SemEval dataset?

5-TableII-1.png: They obtained an F-score of 65.44 on the SemEval dataset.</s>
They obtained an F-score of 65.44 on the SemEval dataset.</s>

364.question: What are the state-of-the-art systems?

6-TableIV-1.png: The state-of-the-art systems proposed by [16] are: MFCC, Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients; LDA, Linear Discriminant Analysis; SVM, Support Vector Machine; LSTM, Long Short-Term Memory; BLSTM, Bidirectional Long Short-Term Memory; CNN, Convolutional Neural Network; and E2, a proposed system.</s>
The state-of-the-art systems mentioned in the table are proposed by [16].</s>
5-TableIII-1.png: The state-of-the-art systems mentioned in the table are UWB, INF-UFRGS-OPINION-MINING, LitisMind, plkudlab, SVM + n-grams + sentiment, and M2.</s>
The state-of-the-art systems mentioned in the table are UWB, INF-UFRGS-OPINION-MINING, LitisMind, plkudlab, SVM + n-grams + sentiment, and M2.</s>

364.answer: For sentiment analysis UWB, INF-UFRGS-OPINION-MINING, LitisMind, pkudblab and SVM + n-grams + sentiment and for emotion analysis MaxEnt, SVM, LSTM, BiLSTM and CNN
